body: I wonder how many more chapters Kiliu has for those characters

Got me with the Kiliu tag bait, first time Kiliu's work in color? Kiliu has full on games, with moaning and stuff, that one "investigator girl" and her mother with the purple hair, yeah. For some reason, I knew what their hair/eye color would be, of course the ex student council president has to be the token yellow hair "ojou-sama" from (probably) foreign origins, her enforcer, the former vice president has the "strict, disciplined, samurai nihongo onna" girl (but with big tits), busty short hair teacher is the typical "ahh~... naruhodo~" relaxed borderline airheaded closet nympho with her little glasses like a kyoani moe character and lastly, the little otaku shorty who is also a pervert that needs "exp" on the real deal to further her own skill at portraying sex in her craft, is overly enthusiastic about said craft and doesn't mind getting destroyed due to also being a nympho from drawing so much sex, this one I thought would have blue or purple-ish hair, little bit off on that one.
Kiliu got his first color page! What a great milestone for him.
Pgs 170 and 203 onwards; what the actual fuck man...
Needs the death tag warning. Seriously, why only dark skin gets the most of that tag :(
